DataElement.preferredName: Therapeutic Procedure Defibrotide Administered Day Duration
DataElement.preferredDefinition: the number of days defibrotide was administered.

DataElementConcept.preferredDefinition: information related to the administration of defibrotide.

ObjectClass.preferredDefinition: An action or administration of therapeutic agents to produce an effect that is intended to alter the course of a pathologic process.

Concepts.definition: An action or administration of therapeutic agents to produce an effect that is intended to alter or stop a pathologic process.

Property.preferredDefinition: A polydeoxyribonucleotide with antithrombotic, thrombolytic, and fibrinolytic properties.  Defibrotide induces the release of prostaglandin 12 and reduces the expression of adhesion molecules on endothelial cells, thereby interfering with platelet and leukocyte adhesion to the endothelium. (NCI04):The act of having given something (e.g., a medication or test).

Concepts.definition: A polydeoxyribonucleotide with antithrombotic, thrombolytic, and fibrinolytic properties.  Defibrotide induces the release of prostaglandin 12 and reduces the expression of adhesion molecules on endothelial cells, thereby interfering with platelet and leukocyte adhesion to the endothelium. (NCI04)
The act of having given something (e.g., a medication or test).

ConceptualDomain.preferredDefinition: actions or administration of therapeutic agents to produce an effect that is intended to alter the course of a pathologic process (NCI).

DataElementConcept.origin: COG CRF:Children's Oncology Group Case Report Form
DataElementConcept.changeDescription: Changed from CTEP to COG for by script Thu Jan 2 10:00:57 EST 2014

ValueDomain.preferredDefinition: the number of days a medication, protocol agent, or other agent was administered to the patient.

RepresentationTerm.preferredDefinition: The time for Earth to make a complete rotation on its axis; ordinarily divided into twenty-four hours.:The period of time during which something continues.

Concepts.definition: The time for Earth to make a complete rotation on its axis; ordinarily divided into twenty-four hours, equal to 86 400 seconds. This also refers to a specific day.
The period of time during which something continues.
